observation: On July 15th, 2021, @LennyLeonard was observed to perform to a good standard. This was evidenced by his improved communication skills, better attention to detail, and willingness to collaborate with coworkers. His actions show #improvedcommunication #increasedprecision #collaboration. For example, Lenny communicated clearly and effectively with his coworkers, caught errors in his work, and collaborated on projects more readily.
